subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Even with some shows of muscle — the Rockies and the Royals each scored 10 runs, the A’s and the Red Sox eight — major league teams scored an average of 3.27 runs on Monday.
snippet: Even with some shows of muscle — the Rockies and the Royals each scored 10 runs, the A’s and the Red Sox eight — major league teams scored an average of 3.27 runs on Monday.
